title: Great place
review: i really liked the various activities which were designed by this place. many people came here because of the well maintained tourist spot. Many things to eat here and great place to be in a day time.

title: A Major Tourist Attraction
review: Enroute by road from Almora to Binsar,this archeological landmark is a major attraction in this Region.A short stop is well worth it for sightseeing and refreshment.after a long drive

title: Average place
review: It's on the way from Binsar to Almora . It has many places to eat and dine . Not a must visit place but a 5 mins stop would be good .

title: It is awesome place
review: had fun lots very good place.sweets were awesome .must visit.Maintained very well My family loved it lots
